element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm modifies a raster layer by mirroring it horizontally or vertically or inverting its values (the highest values becomes the lowest and viceversa).
The following picture graphically shows the effect of applying the three methods mentioned above on an input layer.
a) input layer; b1) mirror horizontally; b2) mirror vertically; b3) invert.

element.name: METHOD
element.text: The method to use: * Mirror horizontally. * Mirror vertically. * Invert.
